title: Pumpkin pie with sultanas
ingredients: ['Shortcrust pastry', '125g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '60g butter', 'water, as needed', 'Filling', '500g cooked and mashed pumpkin', '200g sugar (brown or caster)', '3 eggs, beaten', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground ginger', '500ml milk', '80g sultanas']
